name: GLYPHS
description:
The most stupid game ever ? PROBABLY !!! Someone is sending you messages through mysterious glyphs. Maybe he wants to tell you something about an ancient world... or not !

Guess the meanings of the glyphs and get out of this absurd experience full of elephants, noses, cats, cheerleaders, bees, fingers, and so on... 

  • WhO is wHo ? 
  • WhO Are yoU ?-?
  • What_IS the aim of all ThIS ?*
  • Whaaaat do You have to DO ?! 
  • ¨ArE the DEVelopers simply stUpId ?,

This text sounds like a big nonsense to you ? Well... at least you've just found one right answer. Go get the others !!!

THE TEAM

Jérôme AUDO = Programming

Flavien COURBIER = Game Art

Rémi BLANC = Game Design & Sound Design

Thomas NICOLET = Support
